member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CurrentSensor
member.summary: A CurrentSensor module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer, based on a SCT-013-030 current sensor

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CurrentSensor.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CurrentSensor.GetCurrentReading
member.summary: Returns the current reading, in amps.
